name: Shantytown
openingHours: Barrio de chabolas está abierta cada día desde las 8:30 a 5.00 pm, (excepto día de Navidad).

offers.description: All tickets include gold panning and train ride.  Adults $25, Student/Senior $20, Children (5-17 years) $10.  Discounted family passes available.  Visit www.shantytown.co.nz for more information.
